data.description: Interface to Quick Mail Transfer Protocol
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
QMTP is Dan Bernstein's Quick Mail Transfer Protocol which is a
    replacement for SMTP. qmail/serialmail includes a C QMTP server and
    client.

    The 'Net' namespace was chosen as Net::QMTP is equivalent to
    existing protocol interfaces, such as Net::SMTP, Net::FTP,
    Net::POP3, etc.

    BTW, QMTP is not QMPC, though they are both Dan Bernstein
    protocols.
